title: Did Alexandria Okasio - Cortez say that there is no difference between billions and trillions?
subtitle: The young candidate for Congress has already become the focus of cynical and vague attention, not always in a clear way.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: The Alexandrian Congress candidate Okasio Cortez said that the difference between billions and trillions of dollars is negligible because it involves only more zeros.
